programme.title: Surprises Inside Titanic: The Turkish Bath
programme.desc: Ken Marschall continues his series into the remarkable surprises he and James Cameron discovered on their 2001 and 2005 dives to Titanic.

programme.title: The Olympic Class Ships
programme.desc: Titanic Author, Mark Chirnside tells us that White Star spent more money on the three Olympic class ships then the entire value of their fleet in 1908. Were the Olympic Class ships the peak of shipbuilding in the early 1900’s?

programme.title: The Californian Was Not the Mystery Ship
programme.desc: Molony states categorically and for all times that the Californian was not the mystery ship. No matter how you come down on this issue, this segment is a must watch! Molony gives a very detailed and fascinating argument on this historical dispute.

programme.title: The Last Remaining White Star Ship
programme.desc: Built next to its bigger sisters in the H&W shipyards SS Nomadic, Titanic and Olympic’s tender, gives us the only remaining glimpse into what it was like to be onboard the Titanic.

programme.title: The Titanic Baby
programme.desc: Charles Haas remembers his friend Titanic survivor Frank Aks, who was always known as the “Titanic Baby.” Charles gives us the inspiring story of Frank’s life in a touching tribute to a survivor who was given a second chance at life and made the...

programme.title: A Thief on Titanic
programme.desc: It’s always been a mystery why so many passengers on board Titanic were traveling incognito. Senan Molony uncovers the identity of one secret traveler, who ended up being a thief.

programme.title: The Captain's Table
programme.desc: First class trans-Atlantic travel is synonymous with fine dining. For the select few, the ultimate dining experience is to be invited to the Captain’s table. Sauder takes us back in time and gives us a seat at Captain Smith’s table.

programme.title: Selling Second Class
programme.desc: Senan Molony gives us a rare look at a Titanic advertising brochure directed at second-class passengers. What White Star was selling in the cutthroat world of transatlantic competition back in 1912, might surprise you.

programme.title: Titanic's Pilot
programme.desc: We hear very little about the Pilots who navigated Titanic out of her harbors. Craig Sopin introduces us to David Smyth, who took Titanic out of Belfast Harbor.

programme.title: Five Scratches in the Hull
programme.desc: The prevailing theory has always been that Titanic sideswiped the iceberg creating a 300 ft gash along her side. Famed Titanic Explorer, P.H. Nargeolet, discovered five scratches down her side.

programme.title: Was Titanic's Rudder Too Small?
programme.desc: Was the size of Titanic’s rudder the real reason why she couldn’t turn in time to miss the iceberg? Was the rudder just too small for Titanic’s size? Former Naval Ofﬁcer, Parks Stephenson, gives us the answers.

programme.title: Fixing The Wireless
programme.desc: If Jack Phillips had followed the rules, the wireless set would have still been broken the night the Titanic hit the iceberg and the Carpathia may never have received the distress call in time. Instead, Jack took initiative and fixed it himself and...

programme.title: Did the Lights Stay On?
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson introduces an eyewitness account who says that the lights stayed on in the aft part of Titanic after she broke! Parks also explains how this could have happened.

programme.title: Titanic's Morse Lamps
programme.desc: Before radio, ships had to communicate with each other visually. During the day they used hand flags and at night it was through morse lamps. Bill Sauder explains Titanic’s Lamps: where they were located and how they were used.

programme.title: Titanic’s Pumps
programme.desc: Titanic’s engineers have always been an enduring story as they struggled with the pumps downstairs trying to keep them going to the very end. Was there ever any hope in their heroism?

programme.title: Did the Lifeboats Douse Their Lights?
programme.desc: Evidence seems to suggest that lifeboats doused their lights to avoid being overcome by survivors in the water. It is indeed a grim side of the Titanic story. Senan Molony gives us the full account of what happened that night.

programme.title: Did the Lights Stay On?
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson introduces an eyewitness account who says that the lights stayed on in the aft part of Titanic after she broke! Parks also explains how this could have happened.

programme.title: The Big Four
programme.desc: Celtic, Cedric, Baltic, and Adriatic proceeded the design of Olympic, Titanic, and Britannic. Titanic Channel Host Mark Chirnside reveals why in many ways, they were perhaps the most successful quartet of ships ever built for North Atlantic service.

programme.title: Another View on the Coal Burning Fire
programme.desc: A recent documentary presented new theories about the coal burning fire onboard Titanic. Parks Stephenson gives his view of the fire and how it affected Titanic. Senan Molony and Parks Stephenson, two of our hosts, are on Titanic’s center stage!

programme.title: Watertight Compartments
programme.desc: Can we design a passenger ship that is truly unsinkable? Parks Stephenson looks at that question as it relates to the design and effectiveness of watertight compartments both in 1912 and today.

programme.title: Titanic's First-Class Lounge
programme.desc: What did you do in Titanic’s First Class Lounge? Well oddly enough you didn’t lounge, corsets and celluloid collars prevented that! Bill Sauder gives us a look at what went on inside Titanic’s magnificent lounge for the rich and famous.

programme.title: The Last Remaining Lifeboat
programme.desc: John White, from White Star Memories, takes us through the preservation of Nomadic’s last lifeboat. From her discovery in France to her Belfast restoration, White Star’s last remaining lifeboat carries on the legacy.

programme.title: The Lost Documents of Titanic: The Log Books
programme.desc: What could the log books from the Titanic and the Californian tell us today? Would they shed any light on the operations of either ship that night? In part one of this two-part series, Titanic Channel Host and author Charles Haas speculates what we might...

programme.title: One Water Race 2025 - The Film Eng
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 10 mixed teams of 4 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness.

programme.title: MDS 120 Cappadocia 2025 Eng
programme.desc: In the 2025 Marathon des Sables 120 Cappadocia, we follow the adventure of Pierre Borgella and his cousin Léo Lefebvre, who take on the 120 km of the event over 4 days and 3 nights in self-sufficiency. The adventure is even more enormous for Pierre because he lost a leg following an accident and he decided to participate in this race LIKE EVERYONE ELSE.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 1 - Caroline Gleich
programme.desc: Caroline Gleich, a world class ski mountaineer, summited Mt. Everest last spring as part of her #ClimbForEquality campaign to raise awareness for gender equality. In Episode 1, Gleich overcomes her own struggle after tearing her ACL to rise to the top for all women. (English version with French, Italian, German and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: The First Second - Samantha Davies
programme.desc: Samantha Davies sees the ocean as a pleasure, obvious. In symbiosis with her boat, she leads a violent struggle with the harsh conditions and "loves it" in an almost inexplicable way! She knows and enjoys her luck, which she shares with Initiatives Cœur. She also measures it to that of her grandfather, a war submariner…. At the start of a race like the Vendée Globe, it is an adventurer who sets off.

programme.title: Nadelhorn Via Normal Route - The Best Alpine Experience Eng
programme.desc: Cris and Viv are hiking to the summit of Nadelhorn (4,327 m), which lies in the Mischabel group in Switzerland. We follow their adventure from the village of Saas-Fee to the Mischabel Hut, a mountain hut that lies at an elevation of 3,340 meters and that has beautiful views of Lenzspitze, Dom, Nadelhorn, Weissmies, and many other 4000-meter peaks. And finally after having crossed the Hohbalmgletscher, they go over the North-East ridge to get to the summit of Nadelhorn which offers superb views of the Alps and their summits such as the Weisshorn and the famous Matterhorn.

programme.title: Spartan Trifecta World Championship 2025 Eng

programme.title: Best Via Ferrata In The Dolomites Climbing Possnecker Eng
programme.desc: Cris and Viv climb Piz Selva, a 2,941m mountain belonging to the Sella group, an iconic giant of the Dolomites.They start their hike from Passo Sella, and their chosen route was via Ferrata Possnecker (also called Ferrata delle Mesules), one of the oldest Via Ferratas in the Dolomites.

programme.title: Eng 9 From Brush to Structure Fires

Back at the Station, since its the Captains Birthday, everyone, including the cameraman, have to workout to one of Kareys workout DVDs,. The Captain is quite the animal lover, she actually works for a Pit Bull shelter in Fresno. 4:00AM, a call comes in. Its a structure fire, at this fire the Captain meets up with her husband, a Captain on Engine 3s "B" Shift. Once again, youll see Captain Durney, he may be close to retirement, but that does not stop him from doing all he can, all of the time.

programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents United Fight League 1. In this episode, Zurina Turrey faces Veronika Smolkova, Luis Iniguez takes on Ivey Nixon in a Welterweight Grand Prix, Amun Cosme faces Jackson Santa Cruz and Jered Gwerder fights Dan Huber.

programme.title: UFA 345-346 - Bare Knuckle Boxing 33
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 33 Part 1 from London. In this episode, Sean McPike faces Ash Williams in a battle between Birmingham and Wales. Nathan Decastro takes on Tony Shields, Luke Smith gets in the ring with Corey Healey, Liam Rees fights Joe Fitzpatrick in a flyweight title clash and Bradley Scott current cruiser weight champion faces the challenger Kevin Greenwood for the title. United Fight Alliance presents Bare Knuckle Boxing 33 Part 1 from London part 2. Starting off this episode, Irelands Jonny Lawson battles Brightons Sonny Smith in the Prize Fighter semi-final bout and Aaron Sinclair and Scott McHugh matchup for the second semi-final bout where the winning fighters will head to Thailand for the final match. Dan Lerwell takes on C.J. Mills in the World Middle Weight Title clash and in the main event Jimmy Sweeney takes on Ionel Levitchi.

programme.title: UFA 304 - Real Fight Promotion 86
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Real Fight Promotion 86 from Lviv, Ukraine. In a featherweight bout, Ivan Maryniak faces Ivan Kurkodym, in the lightweight division Anton Mishushin faces Vladimir Litvityuk, Artur Murtazaev vs Ruslan Moroz, Aleksandr Bezkorovainly vies for the Bantam weight belt against Nazariy Danylyuk, In the main event the featherweight title is at stake as Igor Gryckiv takes on Richie Smullen of Ireland.

programme.title: Dubai Creek: Discover a lost Arabian world
programme.desc: Dubai Creek flows through the Emirates historic heart. For just one dirham, abra rides provide boatloads of nostalgia while travelling between the souks and museums of Deira and Bur Dubai. These heritage hubs recall the Bedouins’ humble and ancient past built on pearls, and then shaped by a free trade boom that brought new settlers to the creek in the early 1900’s. Echoing that era, today’s expats – some descendants of those early traders – share authentic flavours from their homelands in a culinary kaleidoscope that compliments Emirati fare. Popular food tours Food tours are a popular way to explore Dubai Creek. Arva Ahmed is the founder of Frying Pan Adventures. She describes one of the restaurants that features on the tours itinerary. "One of the restaurants we stop on our tour is called Sultan Dubai Falafel," she says. "And the thing that they are known for is stuffed falafels. They stuff them with chilli, onion and sumac. These falafels are the most juiciest most filled with herbs and fragrant falafels that you’re going to find in the city." Deira’s Waterfront market is piled high with technicolour fruit and vegetables and stacks of shellfish with legs choreographed in chorus-line unison. Here you can buy the catch of the day and have it cooked in many different ways for old-school Creekside dining. Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary Until recently, the creek ended at Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary. Here nature lovers can spot flamingos that migrate to the Sanctuary, a wetland extension of the creek spread over 6.2 sq.km. It features a variety of mangroves and lagoons perfect for migrating birds - the sanctuary is home to over 180 species of birds. Following its expansion as Dubai Canal, the creek curves past book-shaped Mohammed Bin Rashid Library, high-rise Business Bay and beach-hugging Jumeirah before it’s reunited with its source - the glittering Arabian Gulf.

programme.title: La Mer, Dubai’s newest beachfront neighbourhood, offers hip restaurants, water sports and fun parks
programme.desc: With the construction of Dubai’s latest luxury residential development, Port de La Mer by Meraas , and new hotel, Rove La Mer , La Mer is a of rising interest in today’s property market. La Mer, open since 2017, is one of Dubai’s most colourful seaside neighbourhoods, nestled on the northern shoreline. Divided into two areas, La Mer South and La Mer North, it’s defined by its retro Californian style. The Instagram-friendly destination offers a heady mix of water sports, fun parks, fashionable restaurants, street art and seasonal parties after dark. By day, visitors can hire sunbeds or rent wooden day rooms on La Mer Beach. The multi-coloured beach huts house showers. La Mer beach club, Train , is fully licensed with a shisha area, but its name is derived from its fitness facilities – it has a gym and a boxing and yoga studio – and its Origin 33 restaurant and lounge also serves healthy meals and a menu of fresh juices and smoothies. The best restaurants in La Mer, according to local award-givers, include Masti , a beachfront eatery applauded for its modern Indian cuisine, innovative mixology and eclectic interior design by Studio Lotus. The name Masti is derived from the Hindi word for fun and mischief and the décor and dishes live up to the name, with cheeky monkey artwork and playful fusions for the palate such as the tandoori chicken bao. Another creative culinary outlet is iScream . Managing Partner Rami Halawi came up with the concept for iScream with his family. Offering a wide selection of unusual flavours is the brand’s unique selling point. “Here at iScream, we’re very crazy; thats why we have crazy flavours like curry, kulfi, tabbouleh, ketchup and Mexican chilli-chocolate,” says Rami. On certain days, customers are invited to scream into a sound monitor for their ice cream – if they beat the highest recording in decibels, they win their ice cream for free. La Mer’s shops focus on beach pursuits and accessories, making it a good place to shop for swimwear, sunglasses, suntan lotion

programme.title: "This is insane" Supercar Blondie's F1 crash course
programme.desc: Euronews Evan Bourke joins social media star, Supercar Blondie , to test drive an F1 racing car in Dubai. Shes become a social media sensation for testing out some of the worlds most beautiful cars, so what better way to meet Supercar Blondie , than to propose a test drive in the ultimate racing machine - an F1 race car. Euronews Dubai based correspondent Evan Bourke was given the breathtakingly gruesome job -honestly, his colleagues are not jealous - of having to take part in the test drive at the Dubai Autodome . The race track is one of the few places in the world where it is possible to get in an F1 car and experience the adrenaline rush that 6G and more than 500 horsepower has to offer. Supercarblondie has six million Instagram followers and is known for her love of Supercars but even this was a first for her. To watch the full episode of Adventures, click on the video link above.

programme.title: La Mer: Dubai's bohemian beachfront
programme.desc: Postcards heads down to La Mer, Dubais newest beachfront development to check out the vintage-style beach huts, water sports, restaurants, bars, fashion stores and street art. A magnet for Instagrammers, La Mer is one of Dubai’s most colourful seaside destinations. The street art here talks to its audience. Visitors can hire a sunbed or rent a whole day room on the sand, and the multi-coloured beach huts house showers. And, if you fancy an ice cream, youll find some interesting flavours. "Here at iScream , we’re very crazy; thats why we have crazy flavours like curry, kulfi, ketchup, Mexican chilli-chocolate and you name it," says iSreams Managing Partner, Rami Halawi. ​At the confluence of north and south La Mer, you’ll find Laguna Water Park . Here you can test your courage on slides knotted with surprise twists and turns, or learn to surf on the 180-degree wave machine by Flowrider. For more wet and wild adventures, head to the beach – there are two water sports centres with a huge range of activities. Its also possible to explore the coast on a guided jet ski tour. Those who prefer airborne adventures can bounce around at Hawa Hawa , the weird and wavy trampoline-like playground imported from Japan. For those who just want to relax and chill out, dont worry, theres still plenty to do. Before day slips into night, secure a seat with sunset views at one of La Mer’s beautiful beachfront eateries. Masti is known for its mixology and its modern Indian cuisine. ​ If thats not enough, La Mer has a vintage-style cinema, fabulous street performers and seasonal celebrations to keep visitors entertained all night long. ​

programme.title: Duck de Chine
programme.desc: When you think Beijing, you think ancient history, bustling metropolis and duck. There arent many meals that can claim royal lineage dating back almost a thousand years to the ancient emperors of China. Known as Peking Duck, Beijing Duck or Chinese Roast Duck , this dish is a signature staple of the city and you could spend weeks soul searching and taste testing your way through a variety of recipes (yes, even KFC has one). To save you time, Duck de Chine is one of the annual contenders for the best roast duck in the land and offers an extravagant dining experience. An impressive and inviting décor, complete with vermillion fabrics, dazzling chandeliers, cozy brick walls and large round tables, offers a luxury setting to indulge in the local specialty. Whether you enjoy sugar or spice, a variety of delicious sides accompany the glistening moist meat of this whole duck, prepared over the open flames of 60 year old Jujube wood. Pro tip: dip the crispy skin directly in the raw sugar and enjoy the ride. Smaller dishes, a separate dim sum menu and a full champagne bar are also available so set aside plenty of time to plant yourself in this beautiful dining room and feast away like its 1330.

programme.title: Dubai acts to stem the tide of single use plastic
programme.desc: Dubai’s airports have banned all single use plastics as the city works towards a plastic-free future. It comes as the attitude towards single use plastics is changing. In Dubai, 90 per cent of people say they are making a conscious effort to reduce their own plastic waste consumption. Nearly four in five say they recycle more now than they did five years ago. And one in four people say theyre encouraged to recycle more by corporations championing plastic-free initiatives. Dubai International Airport along with Dubai World Central welcome almost 90 million passengers each year. But with those passengers comes 5,500 tonnes of plastic. The airports’ operator, Dubai Airports, banned all single use plastics from inside the terminal at the beginning of this year. That means that plastic cutlery, water bottles, drinking straws, packaging and polythene bags are all banned from cafes and restaurants. Eugene Barry, Dubai Airports’ executive vice president (commercial), told Focus: “Ninety five per cent of our partners have actually made the pledge to switch from plastic to appropriate and relevant substitutes for some of the products that are used in catering and retail across the airport.” The operator hopes its a strategy that might become a template for other major transportation hubs and businesses. “This is very much the early stages of a long journey, I believe, to have a more environmentally friendly approach to managing businesses,” Barry said. Dubai’s 700 hotels are already looking at alternatives, such as switching water bottles from plastic to glass. Plastic key cards could also be a thing of the past, as developers look into switching them to wood-based materials. The eco packaging company Avani is one firm offering plastic-free alternatives, including a bag made from cassava, a cheap and common root vegetable. The material is biodegradable and compostable, breaking down over a period of months on land or at sea. Peter Avram, managing director of Avani Middle East, said: “Until a c

programme.title: Panoramic Paramotoring
programme.desc: It consists of a tricycle, an engine powering a propeller that fills a canopy and - thankfully- a back-up canopy. One of the smallest aircraft in the world, Paramotors are the latest way to take to the skies above Dubais sand dunes. And as its wing rises, so does Euronews James OHagans nerves: "My pilot Jos assures me he’s never needed it ( the backup wing)." The morning mist clears and Jos Vandenbroucke, General manager pf Paramotor Desert Adventure, has given the word to go ahead. "Ready for rock and roll? he says. "We’re like 40/50 metres. No more. We can easily go up to 12,000 feet. In case we have an engine failure, it’s just doing this (Jos turns off engine)." Paramotors are one of the smallest aircraft in the world and have a great safety record because the engine is only needed for gaining altitude and can be switched off when you come back down to land. "We will do a spiral. If you can’t hold it anymore James, you just shout." "Now we do a 360 to the right. Yalla, here we go!" "The G-force in your stomach is class!" says OHagan. Flying over a stretch of desert reserve, you can see an array of wildlife; families of camels, Arabian oryx and even a tower of giraffes. "After that, I think I can safely say that I’ve got over my fear of flying and kiss the ground," says OHagan.

programme.title: Keeping tradition alive in Dubai
programme.desc: Tradition isnt exactly what first comes to mind when one thinks of Dubai, a city that quite literally grew out of the desert, but tourists are flocking to the Middle Eastern oasis for a taste of its Bedouin past. Camel races Old meets new can be seen at Dubais Camel Racing Club where these ships of the desert sprint across the perimeter of the famed Al Mamoom racetrack. Attracting both camel owners and punters alike, spectators can sit in their cars and drive alongside the camels as they hurtle towards the finish line, guided by a remote control jockey. Organisers say the event is a draw for tourists for a number of reasons. “When tourists come to the camel racing venues, they see something new. They see how people treat the camels and how the camels compete with each other. They also see how Emirati society promotes camels, says the clubs CEO and General Amanager Ali Saeed Bin Saroud. Camel racing was promoted by the former UAE president, Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan as a way of bringing camels and back into mainstream Dubai culture. The Dubai Royal Family also actively support camel racing as a way of preserving the traditional Bedouin culture. Desert culture The Al Marmoom Heritage Festival is Dubai’s annual celebration of the traditional Arabian desert culture and vital role which it plays in the cultural identity of its people. Traditional markets, music and dancing are another way in which the Bedouin culture is kept alive and enjoyed by Dubai locals and tourists alike. Arabic hospitality German expat Ursula Musch moved to Dubai around 20 years ago after first visiting in 1993. She now breeds camels and encourages tourists to experience the Bedouin customs for themselves, as they, like her, may just find their passion in life. My passion or my message is I want to give foreigners, other people the chance to know something from the Arabic hospitality, from their tradition, from their culture, to show it to give it to other people who don’t

programme.title: Tokyo
programme.desc: When you look out your taxi window here, you see life in High-Definition (HD). Tokyo glistens and glows with precision and truly stands in a class of her own. Every street, alley, and crevice lends itself as a gateway to adventures with endless possibilities. A city rooted in heavy history and tradition, but propelled by innovation and imagination, Tokyo has a spellbinding flare for artisan culture, creativity, and design. There is no place like it on Earth, and being home to more Michelin stars than any other place in the world is merely a symbol of Tokyoites devotion to craftsmanship and inventiveness. This city is an endless feast of inspiration - exploring the unknown and finding new paths is highly recommended. Remember to stay humble and behave respectfully, because good manners and thoughtfulness are the real ways to truly experiencing Tokyo and making a few fabulous friends along the way.

programme.title: Taste Dubai: An Emirati Iftar
programme.desc: During Ramadan, practising Muslims abstain from eating and drinking during daylight hours. The meal that follows is known as Iftar, and you do not have to be Muslim to partake in one. In this edition of Taste, Euronews visited the Jumeirah Zabeel Saray Hotel in Dubai, to sample the special Iftar menu produced by the worlds first Emirati chef. After Athan, the call for evening prayer, Muslims who have been fasting all day can finally eat and drink. The fast is broken by first eating dates. This is of great religious significance, chef Musabbeh Al Kaabi explained. "Prophet Mohammed used to do this when he was breaking his fast, so we always break it with the dates then laban (a fermented milk drink) or water," he said. Chef Musabbeh first served up a traditional dish - king rice. Its name comes from its historically prestigious status as an expensive dish only eaten by royalty or the rich. "Liver is there, beef is there, saffron rice is there. So it’s all luxury things. I have cooked saffron rice, I have fried cauliflower, boiled chickpeas. Now I need to take the flavour of the onions with all these things," Chef Musabbeh said as he prepared the dish. "I will put the rice in now. I’ll put some spices in as well. So now, I’m going to put it on a plate, and I’m going to garnish it" But, before eating, everyone said Bismillā, which means in the name of Allah. Chef Musabbeh then prepared his second dish the famous Emirati ouzi with oriental rice, a lamb dish with cinnamon and cardamom. You can make the dish yourself by following the recipe below: Chef Musabbehs Ouzi and Oriental Rice Recipe Ingredients: 1100g lamb shank 500g of basmati rice 100g of minced lamb 2 bay leaves 3 cinnamon sticks 10g of garlic - freshly chopped 120g of onion - freshly chopped 100g of tomato - freshly chopped 20g of ghee butter Salt and pepper 6.5ml of water 10g of tamarind powder 40g of Emirati spices 30g of tomato paste 40g of coriander - freshly chopped Instructions: 1. Chop the onions, garli

programme.title: Find out why medical tourism is big business in Dubai
programme.desc: Medical tourism is a booming global industry, estimates on market size vary but the Patients Without Borders publishing group puts its value at around €60 to €80 billion worldwide, each year, with 20 to 24 million patients travelling for medical treatments annually. Around the world, aging populations, rising healthcare costs, and pressures on the insurance industry have created opportunities for destinations like Dubai , that have been able to invest rapidly in their healthcare infrastructure and capitalise on the sharp increase in demand for health tourism. Encouraging international institutions Dr Marwan Mohamed Al Mulla, CEO, Health Regulation Sector, Dubai Health Authority said, “Recently a new law has come into effect which encourages and allows international institutions to have their own, 100 percent ownership The Dubai Health Authority has had a medical tourism strategy in place since 2014 with the aim of developing and supporting its healthcare sector and steadily increasing its contribution towards Dubais gross domestic product. Focusing on an inbound patient’s airport-to-airport needs has helped providers capitalise too. Dr Basel Nasrallah, Medical Director, Armada said, “We in our facility, for example, get about 5 percent more patients from abroad. Patients are coming from all around the world. We are receiving patients from Russia, mainly Europe, Italy, Spain, UK, and North America from Africa, from South Asia Why have health checks in Dubai? Interestingly, many of those countries are known for the strength of their own medical tourism offerings, but Dubai is still an attractive option for patients who are looking to combine their treatments with other pursuits. Alexander Edwards, Surgical Patient, from the UK said, “Well there were multiple aspects I looked at prior to coming obviously looking at the time it takes, for the recovery period. I had all the research done before I came and found some fantastic reviews, very positive feedback from other friends and family that

programme.title: Broken Spanish
programme.desc: Theres a distinct image that might pop up in your head when you think of Mexican food. It may involve a puddle of beans next to over-sauced enchiladas. It may involve yellow cheese and crunchy shells. It may involve trucks and outdoor salsa bars. It most likely does not involve crispy skinned pork belly studded with pungent elephant garlic and elegantly strewn with radish sprouts and micro herbs. But maybe it should.Chef Ray Garcia—a born-and-bred Angeleno—is on the forefront of the modern Mexican food movement thats taking over the city, and Broken Spanish is his swanky flagship. The aforementioned CHICHARRON is one of the best large-format meat dishes in a 50-mile radius, while the LAMB NECK TAMAL is all gamey funk and pillowy tender masa. For dessert, the CAFE DE OLLA is a Mexican firing squad of chocolate, beer, and coffee to the face. The hyper-modern space—a mix of retro concrete breezeblocks, macrame, and greenery—is the perfect spot for that mezcal nightcap.

programme.title: Backstage with Bell Biv DeVoe
programme.desc: We go backstage with Bell Biv DeVoe as they get ready for their long-anticipated New Edition reunion tour. Then we catch up with Curtis Benjamin, the founder of Save Our Daughters.” Hes on a mission to help daughters around the country. Then we talk to Ron Hickland, the engineer behind some of Americas top performing bowling balls. Hes shows us the career benefits of a STEM education. And finally, Dr. Khalil Muhammad shows us how hes lifting his community through the Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture.

programme.title: Creating More Women Leaders In Cannabis

programme.title: Nate Parker Flies Far Beyond the Lights as Leading Man
programme.desc: Nate Parker talks about his first leading role in the movie "Beyond the Lights." Then, we profile an entrepreneur who turned her illness into an opportunity of a lifetime. Dawn Fitch, founder and CEO of Pooka Pure & Simple, takes us on her journey. We also hear from Bruce Gordon, who currently serves on three corporate Boards. He says diversity in corporate America starts from the top. And later, we feature an organization helping defense attorneys around the country better represent the underprivileged. Its Gideons Promise.

programme.title: Equity in America
programme.desc: America has an equity problem and it’s no surprise that the pandemic and social movements of today have highlighted racial disparities. In this conversation, we’ve brought together public and private sector leaders who can help us unpack equity and the role they play in creating solutions that build more equitable and thriving communities.

programme.title: Preview for "Journey through Maui"
programme.desc: Relax with scenes from magical Maui. Underwater scenes highlight the island’s vibrant marine life, with colorful fish and coral formations visible in clear, shallow waters. Each shot captures a peaceful, relaxing atmosphere, inviting viewers to experience the calm and wonder of Maui’s landscapes and seascapes. The full two hour film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Gold Dust
programme.desc: Somewhere along the border with Mexico, two lifelong friends - prospectors - use moth eaten maps and passed down legends in a lifelong search to find a ghost ship rumored to have been buried in the desert sand over millennia as the seafloor dried up. Today, Mexican drug lords operate here, using a fleet of children in ultra light airplanes, flying in a new type of treasure - heroin - modern gold dust. These two friends must decide between pursuing their dreams of treasure, suddenly so close, and what they know is right. To save themselves, or risk their lives to save a young girl captive to the drug lord. GOLD DUST is a wild adventure of treasure and ghosts, mirages and orphans, shattered dreams and lost loves. It blends the stark deadly beauty of the desert with a villain so disarmingly dangerous he becomes terrifyingly elegant. Classical music. Thundering opera. Rattlesnakes and precious gems. Mansions and gold mines. Friendship and despair. Hope. Death. And Love. Treasure beyond imagination always vanishes in the desert wind.

programme.title: Exploring the Intersection of Sports, Blockchain & NFTs at Korean Blockchain Week 2025
programme.desc: Live from Korea Blockchain Week 2025, join us at The Edge of Show where we dive deep into the evolving world of NFTs, blockchain, and the intersection of sports and technology! This episode features insightful discussions with industry leaders, Jonathan Covey, CMO of Zetachain, Cameron Kates, CEO of Apecoin and NBA superstar Tristan Thompson. In this episode, we explore: The current state and future of the NFT industry, including the new cycles of growth. The dissolution of ApeCoin DAO and the transition to a more agile governance structure. Tristan Thompson's journey into the Web3 space, his new project basketball.fun, and how it empowers fans to engage with their favorite players. The importance of community in decentralized projects and the innovative solutions being developed in the health sector with AxonDAO. Whether you're a crypto enthusiast, a sports fan, or just curious about the future of digital assets, this episode is packed with valuable insights and exciting developments.

programme.title: Spotlight - Eden Energy
programme.desc: Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future. EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: BLACKROCK PICKS ETHEREUM?! XRP Holders Need To Watch This
programme.desc: People are speculating that BlackRock is going to be using Ethereum for its tokenization tech! This would be huge, which chain do you think they will choose?

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.title: CHAI MEIN HAADI
programme.desc: Sundar during his break time eagerly goes outside, digs up a bone which he has stored there, kisses it and happily brings it to his tent inside the hotel. He is about to lick it when an angry Chai Raja snatches it and throws it away warning Sundar never to touch it. Though utterly disappointed, the obedient Sundar decides to forget about the bone. But the naughty Basha who sees this charade has no plans of leaving it. What follows is an endless chain of event when the bone pops up all over the teashop in the customers vada, in Chai Rajas tea tumbler, on the kitchen counter, on Chai Rajas head and in Sundars mouth. And poor Sundar is getting it hard from Chai Raja. The entire episode is about Sundar trying everything possible to get the god-forsaken bone out of the tea shop. But it backfires every single time!

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Sundar Bana Hulk
programme.desc: A customer who is a doctor comes to the caf carrying a box filled with test tubes. He accidentally leaves a test tube behind by which Sundar happens to drink it. Sundar now starts having episodes where he turns into a muscular, scary version of himself for a brief while (like Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde). He bullies Chair Raja and Basha during these episodes but then the potion starts to wear off. Sundar continues to fake it but finally has to bear the brunt of his bullying.

programme.title: MOUSE TRAP
programme.desc: Business is a bit slow at the tea shop and Chai Raja tries churning up new inventive snacks to entice in the customers. The overworked Sundar can only salivate at the sight of the overflowing platters of food and zealously guards them from Basha. It takes all of Sundars self-control not to sample even a fallen fritter/vada. Chai Raja meanwhile opens his larder to take some more flour when much to his shock, he sees a small tail flick out of sight. Mice!! Chai Raja immediately sets Sundar the task of getting rid of them. Sundar after some paw-snapped agony manages to rig a mousetrap and sets it to catch the scurrying culprit. He waits all night and finally dozes off when he is awakened by the snap of the trap. Sundar victoriously marches only to find in the trap, a baby mouse in a diaper. The little tyke of a rodent wails so piteously that Sundar, after some stern admonishing, ushers out of the shop and signals that he should not return. Next morning , business is brisk and Sundar rushes about to wait on customers when he hears a shriek. The lady customer points and much to his shock Sundar sees the diaper-mouse scurry with fritters. Sundar gets an earful from Chai Raja for not completing his task. The wily Basha meanwhile ferrets out the baby mouse and surprises it as it steals the next time- but Basha too is charmed by the baby mouse and ends up showing it his secret stash of fritters. The baby mouse acts as in complete awe of Basha and wants to be his crony.Basha is thrilled and starts tutoring the baby mouse in the art of stealing fritters. The baby mouse goes one step further and uses his big baby eyes each time Sundar catches him- one long wide-eyed pleading look and Sundars heart melts. Both Sundar and Basha think that they will be the mentor to the baby mouse who however is quite a prankster.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Pirate Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: WATER WATER
programme.desc: It is a fine morning with customers pouring in. But Chai Raja realizes that he has run out of water for making tea. And he calls Sundar to fill the bucket with water. What follows is an absolutely crazy line of madness when poor Sundar tries to fill his bucket with water and a naughty naughtynaughtyBasha snatches away all the snacks in the teashop and also makes Sundars water fetching chore a literal nightmare. It ends up with the entire teashop drowning in water. And an excited Sundar swimming triumphantly towards his master with a bucket of water. OfcourseSundar gets a clean trashing!!!

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: FLYING TEA
programme.desc: The food inspector in in the hotel for an inspection. Juicy jalebis are being fried in the shop and a housefly comes to munch on them. Food inspector is angry and says a fly is a big NO NO. Chai Raja looks at Sundar angrily. Sundar whacks the fly with his towel and throws him out. The defeated fly sadly flies out of the shop, only to be seen by Basha who inspires him, teams up with him and decide to attack the teashop. The duo wreaks havoc in the teashop with tea flying all over the place and jalebis getting thrown all over and the customers going mad with the menacing fly. And the food inspector is visiting again and again to check the cleanliness. Chai Raja is going crazy and he knows that this is all due to Sundars fault. And now poor Sundar has two enemies Basha and the fly! Plus the strict food inspector! Oh o!!!

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: START CAMERA ACTION
programme.desc: A movie shooting crew comes to the premises of Hotel California and decides that as their shooting location. Chai Raja is excited about the unexpected business opportunity. To Sundars delight, it is his dream girl the Poodle who is doing a role in the movie. To Chai Rajas annoyance Sundar is all about wooing and impressing the girl poodle. Naughty Basha has two plans stealing his favourite snacks and disrupting Sundars love moves. The movie set literally falls down to pieces!!!

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: Where’s Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Sponge
programme.desc: Soak up the creativity like a sponge would, lets see what Hepi and Briko are up to

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: King couch potato
programme.desc: The twins travel to a medieval castle where they meet a king who is too comfortable and lazy to ever leave home.

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: Pancake Icorn
programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: The Forbbiden Room – Bluebeard
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the mysterious story of BLUEBEARD, having been called out by two MUSKETEERS, the brothers of MARIE, BLUEBEARD’s latest wife. The brothers have to leave on an urgent mission and they cannot visit their newly-married sister. The MUSKETEERS ask SANDRA to investigate their brother-in-law, as they do not trust him. After the MUSKETEERS have left, SANDRA realises the true magnitude of the problem. In the story, it is the MUSKETEERS who save MARIE, just when BLUEBEARD is about to finish her off. If SANDRA and FO do not intervene immediately, MARIÉ will be a goner.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: The Day The Boys Stood Still
programme.desc: Brains does not understand the appeal of Fred’s latest passion: Monster Mud Trucking. Friday makes his muddy dream a reality, never imagining they would awaken the evil Dirt Demons angry about how Humans treat them like…dirt! Brains saves all the boys from being mud statues by learning to love mud trucking.

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: Makilakiski – Makilakiski
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of “The Magic Table, the Golden Donkey and the Cudgel in the Sack” by the Brothers Grimm. In it, a magic cudgel has been stolen from its owner, a humble TAILOR. Shortly after, a terrible crime was committed with the cudgel: the theft of the royal treasure. As a consequence, the TAILOR and his three sons have been arrested by the royal guard and if the gold does not appear by dawn, the TAILOR and his sons will be executed. SANDRA will need to draw on all her talent and bravery to resolve this difficult case in less than 6 hours

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Float Fault
programme.desc: Fred thinks that if Brains’ design is chosen for building the class float in the school parade, she will be more popular. Her design wins, but is too complicated to build, and Fred takes the blame. On parade day, Friday transforms into her design—a working Destroyer that wins “Best Special Effects.’

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Petunias – Snow White Case 3
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, where they find her and the 7 DWARVES asleep around the table. The lethal apple has mysteriously fallen into the soup cauldron and they have all been poisoned. SANDRA comes up with a possible solution: to find, in addition to the PRINCE, 7 DWARF PRINCESSES capable of awaking the DWARVES with a kiss of love. The evil STEPMOTHER will do everything she can to prevent her.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Iris Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Maple is jealous of everything Pancake gets to do because hes older, she sees a chance to be the oldest in the Zooniverse and grabs it. But being oldest isnt as simple as she thinks it will be. Understanding that you have different abilities and responsibilities at every age./Respecting your limits

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Love Deodorant
programme.desc: With the school’s formal dance coming up, Fred insists Friday should be able to do something to find him a love potion so Nora will be attracted to him. Brains catches Friday trying to keep up the charade.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Law of the Timber -1941
programme.desc: The H&L Lumber Company headed by Henry Lorimer and his daughter "Perry", receives a huge national defense order, and prepares to cut the dangerous Antler Valley tract. Eastern dude John Gordon applies for a lumberjack's job and Lorimer hires him. Soon, a series of accidents occur, topped by a forest fire of unknown origin, in which Lorimer is killed. Perry decides to carry on in her father's place, despite the objections of camp manager Barnes, who covets the company. The storehouse, where the dynamite needed to clear an avalanche is stored, explodes and Barnes blames Gordon. The latter has some cartridge cases used by the rifleman to explode the storehouse, and Barnes instructs his henchman Hodge Mason to get the evidence and kill Gordon. Perry overhears and attempts to stop them, but Barnes knocks her unconscious and puts her in the cab of a runaway train. Unable to keep Mason from reaching the plunger to set off an explosion to wreck the train, Gordon boards the speeding engine and races it over the danger spot ahead of the explosion. The engine and a few cars of lumber get through, and Perry is able to deliver the lumber order on schedule. Mason and Barnes are apprehended and Perry learns that Gordon is really John Gordon Hamilton, son of her late father's

programme.title: Saul and David 1964
programme.desc: In Saul and David, the epic struggle of faith, jealousy, and destiny unfolds on the grand scale of biblical history. When humble shepherd David rises to fame after defeating Goliath, he becomes a loyal servant to King Saul. But as David’s popularity grows, Saul’s envy turns to fury, sparking a tragic conflict between king and chosen heir. With sweeping battles, powerful drama, and timeless themes of loyalty and betrayal, this historical epic brings one of the Bible’s most gripping stories to life.

programme.title: Candyland "The Bon Bon Parade" 1935
programme.desc: In The Bon Bon Parade, Walter Lantz delivers a sweet animated fantasy where candy comes to life in a whimsical parade of music and color. Chocolate soldiers march, peppermint sticks dance, and bonbons whirl in a dazzling display of imagination. With playful gags, lively animation, and a sugar-sprinkled sense of fun, this short film serves up a delightful treat for audiences young and old.

programme.title: The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas 1952
programme.desc: In The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas, a heartwarming holiday drama turns tragic when a boy’s dream gift becomes the center of an unexpected accident. As a small-town community reels, the story explores themes of responsibility, forgiveness, and the true meaning of Christmas. Tenderly told and emotionally powerful, this short film offers a timeless reminder of the importance of love, understanding, and family during the holiday season.

programme.title: A String of Blue Beads 1953
programme.desc: In A String of Blue Beads, a touching holiday drama unfolds when a kindly shopkeeper shares the story of a simple Christmas gift that changed a life. As memories of love, sacrifice, and compassion are revealed, the tale reminds us that the season’s true treasures are not found in wealth, but in the bonds of the heart. Gentle, heartfelt, and timeless, this short film delivers a moving message about giving and the enduring power of kindness.

programme.title: Christmas Comes But Once A Year 1938
programme.desc: In Christmas Comes But Once a Year, Fleischer Studios delivers a heartwarming animated short filled with holiday spirit. When a group of orphans wakes to broken toys on Christmas morning, kindly Professor Grampy springs into action. Using his inventive gadgets and boundless cheer, he transforms everyday objects into gifts, bringing joy and laughter to the children. With lively animation, humor, and a touching message, this classic cartoon captures the magic of kindness at Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol 1951
programme.desc: In A Christmas Carol, Alastair Sim delivers a definitive performance as Ebenezer Scrooge, the miser whose icy heart is thawed by a haunting Christmas Eve journey. Visited by the ghost of Jacob Marley and the three Spirits of Christmas, Scrooge is forced to confront his past, witness the struggles of the present, and glimpse the bleak future awaiting him if he does not change. With atmospheric direction, powerful performances, and a timeless message of redemption, this beloved adaptation brings Charles Dickens’ classic tale to life in unforgettable fashion.

programme.title: Guest Joshua Mishoe
programme.desc: The children's TV show, Gullah Gullah Island had the first beloved mainstream Gullah characters. Look out world, here comes the first Gullah anime characters! From Akan and Adrinka symbols to incorporating traditional and cultural elements of the Gullah Geechee, the stories of our ancestors come to life in Camp Geechee. Created by Joshua Mishoe, this young brother is spreading Gullah in a new and fascinating way that is destined to reach and teach scores of new young audiences. Get prepared to do a deep dive into the culture and Camp Geechee!

programme.title: Guest Teedra Moses
programme.desc: Teedra Moses is an incredible singer who’s independent so she’s made the game work for her. Amazing convo about singing and independence.

programme.title: Guest Dr. Greg Carr
programme.desc: Dr. Greg Carr, Associate Professor of Africana Studies & Chair of the Department of Afro-American Studies at ‪Howard University,‬ shares his thoughts on Howard's graduating class of 2025, ‪President Trump's America, the importance of Black consciousness and optimism in the face of oppression.

programme.title: Guests Wesley Morris, Josh Gwynn
programme.desc: The Wonder of Stevie is one of the best podcasts I’ve heard all year. It’s an amazing dive into Stevie’s legendary run in the 70s. Host Wesley Morris and producer Josh Gwynn join me to talk about Stevie and this extraordinary show they’ve put together.

programme.title: Guest Alexander Simone
programme.desc: Host Starr Rocque chats with Nina Simone's grandson, Alexander Simone, about new music, his family's legacy and more.

programme.title: Ahimsa & Environment: Making Peace with Nature
programme.desc: Watch Ahimsa & the Environment and learn how you can be the change you wish to see in the world.

programme.title: Susan Pratt Reveals Cactus Magic!
programme.desc: How to make Cactus Soy Curls, inspired by Ave's chic cactus bag

programme.title: Wicked Kitchen BBQ Beans
programme.desc: Join the Wicked Kitchen and learn how to make the best BBQ beans

programme.title: Susan's Vegan Soy Curl Bolognese
programme.desc: Extraordinary, meaty Bolognese with all the rich flavor but no cholesterol

programme.title: Jamaican Stuffed Sweet Potato
programme.desc: Gabrielle Reyes, aka One Great Vegan, makes magic with sweet potatoes! Sing it, girl! And, get more

programme.title: Sleaford Mods' Vegan Musician
programme.desc: Andrew Fearn is a member of the popular and controversial UK band Sleaford Mods.

programme.title: The Secret Reason We Eat Meat
programme.desc: Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Plant Pure Nation
programme.desc: The documentary that could save your life! Watch the documentary PlantPure Nation for FREE!

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: Codón Es Una Máquina
programme.desc: Dos amigos se reúnen para planear la creación de una película con un equipo de producción filmando el proceso, dos cuarentones con problemitas están muy decididos a hacer la famosa película de la que llevan años hablando. Se vienen tan arriba que hasta ya graban el making of... y hasta están haciendo un casting, aunque no tienen ni guión ni puñetera idea de lo que van a rodar. Y lo peor: no sospechan que están en las manos de un loco peligroso.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Canon: Fidelidad al Límite
programme.desc: Mariana de 35 años, es una arquitecta que trabaja y es socia de un importante despacho de arquitectos, está casada con Julián de 40 años, quien es corresponsal de guerra. Está enamorados, felices, con relación sexual cotidiana. Son padre de dos hijos de 14 y 17 año. En el juego sexual, Julián menciona que no le importaría la infidelidad a condición de estar enterado del hecho con detalles.

programme.title: Hienas
programme.desc: Luis ha metido la pata... hasta el fondo. Pero Pepe está ahí para ayudarlo... a caer. Ninguno de los dos tenía idea del grandísimo lío en el que andaban metidos ya desde hacía tiempo. Una liada de cojones.

programme.title: El Secreto Oculto
programme.desc: Describe los eventos del fin de los tiempos de la humanidad profetizada por místicos y Santos sobre los 3 días de oscuridad en que los demonios serán soldados ...

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes investigadores de fenómenos paranormales reciben el reto de pasar un fin de semana en una casa donde habitan seres malignos. Esto con el fin de presentar las evidencias en su programa de televisión y levantar el rating, pero lo que no saben es que el reto les costara muy caro.

programme.title: Where You Meet With God
programme.desc: Don’t go for a goal without God this year. When you invite His presence in, He’ll be with you every step of the way, bringing things to the surface, and showing you what to reach for.

programme.title: When You Just Can't Win
programme.desc: If you’re feeling stuck in a cycle of defeat, remember that God’s promises are guaranteed but not automatic. Keep consistently showing up and praising Him for the victories He’s given you, because more are on the way.

programme.title: Look Forward Not Far
programme.desc: We all go through times when we’re looking ahead, and our future looks uncertain. We want clarity, but instead, God gives us the courage to move forward in faith. It’s in these moments we learn not to be driven by what’s easy but to be pulled forward by purpose.

programme.title: New Number Same Name
programme.desc: If you’re looking at what’s next and feeling nervous, remember this: What God has done in your life is only the foundation, not the finish line. He’s a creative God, still at work in ways you’re not expecting. Let go of your plan so God can show you His purpose.
